moves.1. Nf3: this is what Freddy plays, so do i.
moves.2. d4 g6: planning to go Bg7 and direct his DSB on the a1 thru h8 file.
moves.7... O-O 8. Ne5: taking advantage of the weak e5 square.
moves.8... Nbd7 9. f4: my knight is not going anywhere!
moves.10... Nxe5 11. fxe5: not dxe5? Qxe3+! winning a pawn
moves.13... Qb5 14. Re1: now im going to try to trap his queen.
moves.14... Be6: if Bf1 black will go Bc4.
moves.17. b4 Qd7: now it's time for positional play.
moves.18. Bc3 Bc4 19. Bf1 Qd5 20. Bxc4: trading off 2 of our best bishops.
this was so he could bring his a8 rook in action.
moves.28. Rbf1 g5: now we are going to work on the f file.
moves.33. g4: !! now this practically forces a draw.
moves.33... Rgf8 34. h3 f4 35. Ke1: all im going to do is wait.
moves.35... f3: ok its going to be a draw unless one of us mess up.
moves.36. Rh2 Rb8 37. Kf2 Bg7: and easy19 offered a draw saying "it's an impossible position, we cant break thru" so i agreed to a draw. hope that you liked it? please leave a comment or 2 and rate it on the star system thanks.
